title: The Week of Oscar Jenkins: The Organized Mentor
summary: Oscar Jenkins discovers his unique ability to foresee and prevent disasters with his organizational skills, using them to save his city over the span of a week.
summaryGerman: Oscar Jenkins entdeckt seine einzigartige Fähigkeit, mit seinen organisatorischen Fähigkeiten Katastrophen vorherzusehen und zu verhindern, und verwendet sie, um seine Stadt innerhalb einer Woche zu retten.
summaryDutch: Oscar Jenkins ontdekt zijn unieke vermogen om rampen te voorzien en te voorkomen met zijn organisatorische vaardigheden, en gebruikt ze om zijn stad te redden gedurende een week.
summaryFrench: Oscar Jenkins découvre sa capacité unique à prévoir et à prévenir les catastrophes grâce à ses compétences organisationnelles, qu'il utilise pour sauver sa ville en l'espace d'une semaine.

story.text: Oscar Jenkins starts his week like any other, mentoring local youth on leadership. But as he organizes an event, he has a sudden vision of a gas leak in the area.
Oscar acts on his premonition, evacuating the building before anyone is harmed. The gas company confirms his suspicion, amazed by his foresight.
Buoyed by his success, Oscar feels a surge of responsibility. He spends the day refining his skills, organizing a small community fair while keeping a vigilant eye.
A suspicious person is observed at the fair. Oscar, following his instincts, diplomatically handles the situation, preventing a potential theft.
Oscar's growing reputation as a protector leads more people to seek his guidance. He mentors them on safety and preparedness, fostering a vigilant community.
His visions become clearer, predicting a major storm. Oscar organizes the town for quick evacuation and safety measures, minimizing the impact.
As the storm clears, Oscar reflects on his eventful week. The town praises him for his heroics, recognizing him as 'The Organized Protector'.

ending: Thus Oscar Jenkins, through simple acts of organization and foresight, became a true hero.
moral: Early preparation and attention to detail can save lives and create heroes.
